alert.note: Alert for Southern Gila County, Tonto National Forest Foothills (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Fire Weather Watch issued June 25 at 12:52PM MST until June 27 at 8:00PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...FIRE WEATHER WATCH IN EFFECT FROM TUESDAY MORNING THROUGH TUESDAY EVENING FOR STRONG WINDS, LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY AND HIGH FIRE DANGER FOR SOUTH-CENTRAL ARIZONA HIGH TERRAIN... The National Weather Service in Phoenix has issued a Fire Weather Watch for strong winds, low relative humidity and high fire danger, which is in effect from Tuesday morning through Tuesday evening. * AFFECTED AREA...Southern Gila County/Tonto National Forest Foothills. * TIMING...From 11 AM to 8 PM MST Tuesday. * WINDS...Southwest 15 to 25 mph with gusts up to 40 mph. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...As low as 7 percent. * IMPACTS...Fuels are dry and fire danger is high. These conditions combined with low relative humidity and strong winds will lead to widespread hazardous fire weather conditions.
info.instruction: Please advise the appropriate officials and fire crews in the field of this fire weather watch.

area.areaDesc: Southern Gila County, Tonto National Forest Foothills
